1: <pb/><t>¡Nim ri Ajawaxel!</t> <t>¡Ri ka Dios takal</t> <t>u ya'ic u k'ij pa ri u tinimit,</t> <t>pa ri tastalicalaj u juyub!</t>
2: <t>¡Sibalaj je'l</t> <t>ri u chicajil ri juyub Sion,</t> <t>jela' pa u xcut ri riquiak'ab</t> <t>ri elebal k'ij!</t> <t>¡Are u quicotemal ronojel ri uwächulew!</t> <t>¡Are u tinimit ri ajawinel</t> <t>ri nim u k'ij!</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ri Dios</t> <t>c'o chquipam cachoch tak ajawinelab</t> <t>pa Jerusalen;</t> <t>ri Dios u k'alajisam rib</t> <t>chi are' panibal ri co jekelic.</t>
4: <t>Ri ajawinelab xquimulij quib</t> <t>junam xebe chrij che u ch'äquic;</t>
5: <t>aretak c'ut xquil</t> <t>ri tinimit xpe canima',</t> <t>man cäquirik ta chic jas cäquibano,</t> <t>xebanimajic.</t>
6: <t>Xechaptaj rumal ri xibriquil:</t> <t>xquibak'atila' quib rumal k'oxom,</t> <t>jacha' jun yawab ixok;</t>
7: <t>jacha' ri quiakik' re elebal k'ij</t> <t>ri quebuc'äjij tak ri jucub re Tarsis.</t>
8: <t>Chupam ri u tinimit ri ka Dios,</t> <t>ri c'o ronojel u cuinem,</t> <t>kilom ruc' ri ka bak'wäch</t> <t>junam ruc' ri tzijom chke:</t> <t>¡Ri Dios cujekeba' na</t> <t>ri tinimit Jerusalen chbe k'ij sak!</t>
9: <pb/><t>Nu Dios,</t> <t>pa u niq'uiajil ri achoch la cujchoman</t> <t>chrij ri nimalaj lok'ok'ebal c'u'x la.</t>
10: <t>Nu Dios,</t> <t>cäya' k'ij la</t> <t>cho ronojel ri uwächulew</t> <t>jas ri takal che ri bi' la.</t> <t>Ruc' ri cuinem la</t> <t>caban la tz'akatalaj suq'uilal.</t>
11: <pb/><t>¡Chquicot ri juyub Sion!</t> <t>¡Chech'opintaj che quicotemal</t> <t>tak ri tinimit aj Juda</t> <t>cumal ri suc'alaj tak chomanic la!</t>
12: <pb/><t>Chisutij rij ri Sion</t> <t>chebiwajilaj c'u ri e tac'atic tak ja</t> <t>ri e c'o chupam;</t>
13: <t>kas chiwila' ri u tapia</t> <t>xukuje' tak ri cachoch</t> <t>tak ri ajawinelab,</t> <t>rech quixcuinic quebitzijoj</t> <t>chque ri e i winakil ri quepe na</t>
14: <t>chi jewa' ri ka Dios,</t> <t>pa ronojel ri chbe k'ij sak.</t> <t>¡Are c'u junalic c'amal ka be!</t>
